channel.title: Posts on bishalbagale
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on bishalbagale

item.title: म छु किन ?
item.description: म छु किन ? म सोच्छु किन फेरि सोचकै बारे म पढ्छु किन दु:ख र सुख को बारे जसरी मानौ दुबै फरक छन धर्ती र आकाश त भेट्छन् जब क्षितिजमा ती नाथे भावना त के स्वर्ग के नर्क झन स्वर्ग के ? नर्क के ? भगवान कुन ? ब्रह्माण्ड कति ? अँगालोमा अट्ने सबै ब्रह्माण्ड अरे भुइँ भरी छरपस्ट भगवान अरे पसारो रहर नया कतै ओइलाएको सपना म टेकूँ त मर्छ कि यो?

item.title: Lovely People
item.description: every new morning hits them like a hammer unique a swift motion in a blur that cracks open their skull and they desperately try to piece it back together with caffeine or some herbal bullshit they’ve been fooled into this continuous disassembling and assembling has left them broken so often beyond repair so miserable and i see them in all of their foolishness as they pretend to care about everything else but self

item.title: has he a clue?
item.description: has he a clue of his fancy wit keeping me hooked like i am stuck with a glue to his cigarette lit and unto his lips, soft and crooked has he a clue of his curls tying me up in a knot until i’m cold and blue wrapped in the pearls of life and rot has he a clue of the love he deserves has he a clue of the love i reserve

item.title: contrast with the wall
item.description: mind corked building up toxic fumes of jealousy, hatred, love, you name it she seems calm nevertheless her body giving away no hints of imbalance eases itself in a classroom full of men or at least she fancies it so her cheeks turn pink a few shades lighter than her lips as she makes her way to the back passing through favoring eyes which she feels like is an eternity of

item.title: yellow
item.description: yellow daffodils the sun, yellow then red and then nothing yellow stars twinkle then tremble most die with a roar worth a blink some fall with a yellow streak in a black backdrop urging me to make a wish and when the fall comes for me and the leaves turn yellow i wish to become a star; the freedom of not wanting not reaching but just to be. so yellow

item.title: she is beautiful
item.description: she is beautiful by the books and the songs about love she is beautiful like the twilight sun and a poet’s muse. she is beautiful so sings the river, lullaby to the clouds. she is beautiful like a mother, with loving heart and boundless grace. she is beautiful like the life itself. she is beautiful and she doesn’t know.

item.title: real snow
item.description: somedays, i doze off thinking how hard of an act it has become to just slither away into dreams and infinity. most days, it keeps me alive. somedays, i dream of you as clear as snow in bright sunlight, and then you melt away. so, it keeps me awake somedays, thinking how i’ve never seen real snow.

item.title: I Think Therefore I am
item.description: Bishal Bagale was here, and this serves as proof of his existence.
